alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:29PM MDT until June 12 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN HAAKON...NORTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA...NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1028 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Ottumwa to 9 miles east of Cactus Flat to 7 miles east of Badlands National Park, moving southeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Philip, Kadoka, Interior, Quinn, Grindstone, Cactus Flat, Cedar Pass, Ottumwa, Billsburg, Cottonwood, Delta 9 Missile Silo, Minuteman Missile Visitors Center, Pinnacles Ranger Station, Grindstone Butte, Delta 1 Launch Facility, eastern Badlands National Park and Intersection of Highway 73 and White River. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 114 and 155. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
